definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: Finally, texture-based algorithm is an overview of the computer analysis of handwriting.
sentences.chinese: 最後是對基於紋理的計算機筆跡算法的分析。

sentences.english: Night decayed, a desk lamp, return yellow books depicting handwriting has light.
sentences.chinese: 夜闌珊，一盞檯燈下，返黃書箋筆跡已淡。

sentences.english: At first glance, one might have taken it for a child`s handwriting.
sentences.chinese: 乍一看，你可能會把那字體當作是孩子的筆跡。

sentences.english: It's always a problem deciphering his handwriting.
It looked like the perfect cursive script from the credits of I Love Lucy.
sentences.chinese: 草書的筆跡像是《我愛露西》演員親筆所寫。

sentences.english: Some graphologists believe that aspects of a person's character are revealed by their handwriting.
sentences.chinese: 一些筆相家相信人的個性方面被他們的筆跡顯示。

sentences.english: She recognized her mother's grace handwriting on the envelope.
sentences.chinese: 她認出信封上她母親那娟秀的筆跡。

sentences.english: This paper presents an approach to perceptually extract multi-oriented text lines from online handwriting.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種多方向手寫筆跡文本行的提取方法。

sentences.english: Sammie opened the envelope and she immediately recognized the handwriting, it was from Lisa.
sentences.chinese: 珊米打開信封，迅速確認了是麗莎的筆跡。

sentences.english: Handwrititing or penmanship,esp.elegant or "beautiful" writing as a decorative art.
sentences.chinese: 書寫的藝術，特別是優雅漂亮可做裝飾的筆跡。

sentences.english: He glanced at the envelope and recognized Eade handwriting.
sentences.chinese: 他看了看信封，認出是伊德的筆跡。

sentences.english: Graphology is the study of how a person's handwriting reveals his or her personality traits.
sentences.chinese: 筆跡學，是指通過某人的手跡揭示出此人的性格特點。

sentences.english: He took out the pencil marks from his drawing.
sentences.chinese: 他擦去了他的畫上的鉛筆跡。

sentences.english: Have you ever had occasion to study character in handwriting?
sentences.chinese: 你有沒有研究過筆跡的特徵？

sentences.english: He glanced at the envelope and recognized Eade's hand.
sentences.chinese: 他看了看信封，認出是伊德的筆跡。

definition: to alter (text)/to change by painting over/to correct (with correction fluid)
to transcribe/to make a fair copy
to mark a text with dots and circles/to punctuate
to trace over/to copy (a calligraphy model)/facsimile/(fig.) to depict/to portray
rough sketch (of a painting)/(of an official) to approve a document by signing it
to copy (a model of calligraphy or painting etc)
